meta_description: The University of Maine Museum of Art enriches the cultural life of the citizens of Maine with particular emphasis on the modern and contemporary.

admission_text:
## Membership

**Membership Matters!  
** Your membership in the UMaine Museum of Art provides the invaluable support that allows the Museum to continue to present innovative exhibitions and education programs. Museum members enjoy exclusive exhibition preview receptions which are opportunities to enjoy the new exhibitions, meet featured artists and socialize with other art enthusiasts. Members also receive special discounts on event tickets, lectures, studio classes, workshops, art camps for children, publications and more. Be part of the UMMA excitement and become a member today!

  * [ ](http://web.archive.org/web/20200204160436/http://our.umaine.edu/s/300/13-ORONO/foundation/index.aspx?sid=300&gid=13&pgid=1145&content_id=1521)

  * [ ](http://web.archive.org/web/20200204160436/https://umma.umaine.edu/resource/membership-form/)

* * *

**Individual** $50  
**Individual educator** $35

  * Invitation to exclusive Members’ Preview Receptions
  * Exhibition brochures mailed to your home
  * Advance notice for special events and educational programs
  * Member acknowledgement in the Museum of Art

* * *

**Dual/Household** $60 

  * All of the above, plus 10% discount on classes

* * *

**Patron** $100 

  * All of the above, plus
  * Membership in NARM (North American Reciprocal Museum Program) – free admission to member museums in the US and Canada

**Sponsor** $250

  * All of the above, plus
  * Six complimentary guest invitations to Members’ Preview Receptions (2 for each...
